content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Ms. Wang. I understand that price is an important factor for you. I'm sure we can find a mutually agreeable rate that reflects the quality of the apartment and the prime location it offers. How much were you thinking of offering?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment seems very nice, and I appreciate the central location. Regarding the price, I am looking for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, and I'm willing to pay a fair price that reflects the value of the property. I'm hoping we can negotiate a rate that is reasonable for both parties. Would you be willing to discuss a lower price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Ms. Wang, I'm glad to hear that you find the apartment attractive. The location is indeed very convenient, and I'm sure you'll appreciate living in the heart of the city. When it comes to price, I'm always open to discussing a fair rate with my tenants. However, I must emphasize that this apartment is brand new and in high demand. Therefore, I'm not looking to negotiate a significantly lower price. Nevertheless, I'm willing to consider a modest discount for a long-term tenant like yourself. What is your ideal price range?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. A long-term tenant might be more attractive to you, and I'm certainly interested in the long-term prospects of this apartment. My ideal price range would be around 10-15% below the initial asking price. I believe this would be a fair reflection of the market value for an unfurnished apartment in this area. Would you be willing to consider this?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Ms. Wang, your offer is quite substantial, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I must be honest with you. Due to the current demand for apartments in the city center and the high quality of this particular unit, I'm not able to offer a discount of that magnitude. Nevertheless, I'm willing to work with you to find a price that is acceptable to both parties. How about we start with a 5% discount from the initial asking price? This would still be a competitive rate for the area, considering the amenities and the new construction. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your willingness to negotiate is much appreciated. A 5% discount would indeed be a step in the right direction. However, considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and my student status, I was hoping for a more substantial discount. Would you be willing to go as high as 10%? This would help me greatly in managing my expenses as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Ms. Wang, as a student, I understand that every euro counts. However, a 10% discount is quite significant, especially for an apartment of this caliber. I'm willing to accommodate you as a long-term tenant, but I cannot go that far without compromising my own financial goals. Let's meet in the middle. How about a 7.5% discount? This would bring the price down to a more manageable level for you while still allowing me to maintain a fair return on my investment. What is your opinion on this new offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of a 7.5% discount is quite generous, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. This discount would indeed make the apartment more affordable for me as a student. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price for both parties. I am willing to accept this offer and commit to a long-term lease. Thank you for your hospitality and for working with me on the price. I look forward to renting the apartment from you.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Ms. Wang. It's always a pleasure to find a tenant who appreciates the value of the property and is willing to commit to a long-term lease. With your acceptance of the 7.5% discount, the rental price will be [x] Euro per month. I hope you'll be very happy in your new home. Shall we proceed with the paperwork to formalize the agreement?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, Mister Schmidt, let's proceed with the paperwork. I'm very excited about this new apartment and the opportunity to live in such a great location. Thank you again for your time and for working with me on the price. I'm looking forward to a long and fruitful relationship as your tenant.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Excellent, Ms. Wang! I'm delighted to have you as a tenant. Once the paperwork is finalized, you'll have the keys to your new home. Enjoy your stay in Munich! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
